Bravo to both Frank's WELL SAID !
 
bruce

Bruce Halliday Paranormal Invest=
igating Team 


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: warrior18eii@...=
: Fri, 16 Nov 2007 05:35:38 -0800Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] my opinion on the m=
ini box






"I have experience with them that most people just dream abou=
t...or fear.  I have been carressed,  molested,  poked,  probed,  slapped, =
 punched,  knocked down and physically Picked Up by a Ghost."Rod,I have see=
n these words before from many different people, both on the web and in rea=
l life. Every one of them changed there tune when they made contact (real c=
ontact). Citing that they didn't know it was possible. In your words you ar=
e a ghost hunter and not an expert (even though you give your GH resume wan=
ting us all to believe so). Ghost hunter thrive on proof! They almost worsh=
ip the words proof and evidence. The fact is that many of us; Sumption, Bru=
ce, Misty, Steve, myself and many others have presented proof on a daily ba=
sis using a myriad of different methods to obtain it. The quote I have plac=
ed above, taken from your own post are just words. Open your mind a bit. As=
 was said earlier you will experience what you expect to experience.Frank R=
.
----- Original Message ----From: erick hunter <erick_hunter9@...>To=
: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comSent: Thursday, November 15, 2007 5:42:06 PMSubjec=
t: RE: [EVP-ITC] my opinion on the mini box


Bruce,  the boxes aside,  I a=
m talking about Ghosts, period.  The boxes are for simple communication,  n=
ot inter-acting.  When I say "inter-acting" I don't mean trade a few words,=
  I'm referring to Meaningful interaction.  Making a Statement,  passing on=
 a message to me or a living relative,  predicting or causing "physical" in=
ferances.   I've experienced every kind of Ghost,  I feel certain,  all ove=
r the world.  I have experience with them that most people just dream about=
...or fear.  I have been carressed,  molested,  poked,  probed,  slapped,  =
punched,  knocked down and physically Picked Up by a Ghost.  I have confron=
ted them face-to-face while they were both visible and invisable.  I have n=
umerous times held conversations with them via voice recorder and once even=
 one-on-one (it was the experience of a life-time!).  I was Hunting Ghosts =
many, many years before it became a fad,  or cool to do so.  And,  believe =
me,  I am far from being an "expert".  I do not presume on Ghosts or their =
personalities.  Every time in the past that I've done so,  I've been rocked=
 back on my heels,  psychologically speaking. Some are good,  some are not.=
  Many of them very much enjoy making you the fool (that's a lot easier don=
e with some people than are others!) .  It doesn't matter in the slightest =
what you Think of them,  They are what they are,  and "being a friend" is d=
efinitely not on their list of priorities!  That goes for All of them.  The=
y will play with you.  They will lie to you.  They will tell, or imply to y=
ou, what they know you want to hear,  that or they will laugh at you.  I ha=
ve personally heard their laughter,  on more than one occasion.  The first =
step in beginning to understand Ghosts is to quit watching stupid TV Ghost =
Dramas,  and learn to be discernful about Reality.  God bless, anyway.     =
   --Rod
 
 
 
 
bruce halliday <paranormalinvestiga ting@hotmail. com> wro=
te:


Rod, No disrespect but how do you know what ghosts havethe where with=
 all to do? I speak with them through frank and joe's box on a daily basis =
and consider thetwo that are communicating daily to be friends. I believe y=
ou are speaking of grounded spirits not etherals and ghosts that are ground=
ed most definately interact with us. residual ghosts and hauntings do not t=
hat is whythere is a distinction between the two intelligent and residual h=
auntings. but we are not talking generaly about haunting spirits that commu=
nicate through frank and joe's boxes, but all types of entities and don't c=
all anyone dillusional unless you yourself have experienced your own resear=
ch with the boxes. Bruce 

Bruce Halliday Paranormal Investigating Team 


=
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .comFrom: erick_hunter9@ yahoo.comDate: Thu, 15 Nov=
 2007 14:18:55 -0800Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] my opinion on the mini box



I =
certainly agree with the point of Bruces' statement,  but I fear he's being=
 delusional about "friends" from the other side affecting some inter-action=
 between a box and the user,  not letting one work,  the box chosing it's o=
wner,  etc., etc., etc.  In the first place Ghosts are Not our Friends!  Th=
at's pure, unadulterated Fantasy.
The Ghosts do not have the where-with-all=
 to accomplish this in the first place, and even if they did they don't giv=
e a rats' rear end what a Ghost Hunter does or doesn't do.  That boy really=
 needs to get real.  Ghosts simply do not re-act to the living in that way,=
 or much of any other way except to allow us to see or hear them and then o=
nly when they want it to happen.  Their most obvious and biggest trait is t=
o be totally indifferent to our wishes.   Over 40 yrs. of Investigating the=
 Paranormal has taught me nothing if it hasn't taught me this.      --Rod
 =

 
 velazquez <ghostchasingfool@ yahoo.com> wrote:


Here, here Bruce.  I a=
m glad others who a genuine support my outlook, I couldn't agree more!bhali=
333 <paranormalinvestiga ting@hotmail. com> wrote: 


since I dropped the b=
omb about this mini box to Frank s. yesterday I did not expect such a ferve=
nt hoopla about it.So I will give my box experienced opinion after lengthy =
research with both Frank's and Joe's boxes. I have contacted the manufactur=
er for an explanation, he instructed me to listen to the audio file and vie=
w the demo video on his site. After doing so my opinion on this box and the=
 builders intentions for it is.The box itself is not a knock off of Frank's=
 box but a cheap and ineffective version of Joe's box,It works on an AM ban=
d instead of an FM band as Joe's box does. Another big difference is Joe's =
box actually works and you have all heard the files I have posted from sess=
ions with it. After listening to this box and seeing it in operation I feel=
 that anyone who purchases this box will be very disappointed and will not =
receive any contact from it and even if they did they probably would not ev=
en realise it for the simple fact that you have to have a certain amount of=
 experience with box research and operation before developing an ear for pi=
cking up real time communication and also creating a bond with the spirit f=
riends on the other side and also a measure of trust on both sides.I believ=
e the manufacturer to be a capitalist and only interested in the monetary r=
eward to be gained from offering this cheap and ineffective copy to unsuspe=
cting and naive individuals who are interested in this medium. I do not lik=
e to bad mouth anyone, it usually comes back to bite you in the ass but I b=
elieve that our friends on the other side know of our intentions and would =
not allow someone with the wrong intentions to develop a working tool for c=
ommunication. also I believe that a person does not pick the box the box pi=
cks the person. So let him have his short and lucrative run with this fooli=
ng unsuspecting clients, bad karma always comes home.Bruce
